entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 overnight. Low minus 11 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning then changing to rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 2.
